entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.

Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate.
